title: Russia-Ukraine war LIVE updates: Indian Embassy in Ukraine to be temporarily relocated in Poland: MEA - India Today
content:
1. Russia-Ukraine war LIVE updates: Indian Embassy in Ukraine to be temporarily relocated in Poland: MEA  India Today
  2. Russia-Ukraine war live updates: Indian embassy in Ukraine will be temporarily relocated to Poland, says MEA  Times of India
  3. Ukraine-Russia War: Indian Embassy In Ukraine Temporary Relocated To Poland  Republic World
  4. India Relocates Embassy To Poland After Attacks In Western Parts Of Ukraine  NDTV
  5. Russia-Ukraine War: Mega Final Assault Looms; Ukraine Says Locals Killed During Evacuation & More  India Today
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Russia-Ukraine War news LIVE updates March 13: As Russia's invasion in Ukraine enters the 18th day, Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said he's open for talks with Russia's Vladimir Putin but only if there is a ceasefire in place. The Ukraine president at a news briefing on Saturday claimed around 1,300 Ukrainian troops have been killed since the start of the Russian invasion of Ukraine. Meanwhile, Russian Deputy Foreign Minister Sergei Ryabkov told state television, that its troops could target the weapons supply sent by the West. On the other hand, the satellite images show Russian forces about 25 km away from the capital city of Kyiv, as per UKâ€™s latest defence intelligence report. Stay tuned to IndiaToday.in for the latest updates.
